abstract: Disney Consumer Products released sales figures for the dresses on Tuesday, an unusual step for the company and a reflection of the movie’s $1.3 billion in global box office sales.
snippet: Disney Consumer Products released sales figures for the dresses on Tuesday, an unusual step for the company and a reflection of the movie’s $1.3 billion in global box office sales.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — More than three million “Frozen” role-play dresses have been sold this year in North America, reflecting the continuing cultural and financial effect of a movie that is now 12 months old.

headline.main: 3 Million ‘Frozen’ Princess Dresses Sold, Disney Says
headline.print_headline: Sales of ‘Frozen’ Costumes top 3 Million, Disney Says
